titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5147) to amend part B of title XVIII of the Social Security Act to repeal the income-related increase in part B premiums that was enacted as part of the Medicare Prescription Drug, Improvement, and Modernization Act of 2003 (Public Law 108-173).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mrs. Lowey. Petition No: 109-17.

bill.summary: 9/13/2006--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5147) to amend part B of title XVIII of the Social Security Act to repeal the income-related increase in part B premiums that was enacted as part of the Medicare Prescription Drug, Improvement, and Modernization Act of 2003 (Public Law 108-173).
